document.title: Hot Topic: New Regulations Will Apply to Small Stormwater Discharges
document.abstract: Discusses a major new rule, proposed by the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency (EPA), that would require permits for small stormwater dischargers in urbanized areas of 50,000 or more, various commercial operations, and construction sites of less than five acres.
